name: Cody AI
about: An AI code assistant built by Sourcegraph that answers questions about your codebase and automates development tasks.
summary: Ask questions about your codebase and get precise answers.
details: Cody AI understands your code contextually, making it easier to debug, explain logic, and generate boilerplate code. It integrates seamlessly with enterprise repositories.
howTo: Install Cody in your IDE or Sourcegraph instance.
Connect it to your code repository.
Ask questions like 'Where is the login API defined?'.
